title: Is Donald Trump a reincarnation of Adolf Hitler? - Quora

response.answer_text: Comparing Trump to Hitler is absurd. Trump may have fascist tendencies — and he does — and he might be a white supremacist — and he is — but he’s not a genocidal murderer. I don’t know that it is fair to compare Trump to anyone. For me he is truly sui generis. He is a huckster and a conman with a history of personal and business corruption open to anyone with eyes to see, yet his diehard supporters will never believe that because they don’t want to. He is dangerous because his supporters enabled him at the ballot box. Because they have tuned their minds off to any source of “information” that doesn’t confirm for them exactly what they want to hear they can never come to see what they did to the country — even if Mueller indicts Trump himself. If I were to compare Trump to anyone I think the only obvious choice is P.T. Barnum. Not nearly as nefarious as Hitler or a gangster, but closer to the point — the archetypical American conman. After all, it was Barnum who reputedly said, “There is a sucker born every minute, and two to take him.” Whether he did or he didn’t, that’s the Trump administration, boiled down to its essence.

No, I don’t think Donald Trump is a reincarnation of Adolf Hitler, and not just because I don’t believe in reincarnation. There will always be a superficial similarity between two narcissists, but that in and of itself is not significant. As far as I know, Trump never had anybody killed, and Hitler is by far a better public speaker.
